price: Er (Musa) sagte: „O Harun, was hat dich, als du sie irregehen sahst, davon abgehalten,
arabic: قَالَ يَٰهَٰرُونُ مَا مَنَعَكَ إِذۡ رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ ضَلُّوٓاْ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: qāla yāhārūnu mā manaʿaka idh ra-aytahum ḍallū
